job_history.work_description: Demonstrated continuous growth and achievements within the automotive industry. Solid business insight with the ability to ascertain needs for customers to increase profits. Tracked and disbursed all loans in a timely manner, communicated full contract disclosures, and accurately controlled paperwork flow. Maintained a strong working relationship with all lenders for four franchises.

Developed a strong rapport with customers to ensure satisfaction. Identified needs of customers to proactively sell products to meet their needs and exceed Florida quotas. Excellent rapport building, skillful presentation, and effective closing skills. Extensive professional training in the areas of sales, relationship building and leadership.

Efficiently analyzed all personal lines of credit to determine acceptability. Provided and/or coordinated full loan service functions for customers. Ability to work productively with all levels of the organization to add value and consistently contribute to the team.

Demonstrated strong project management skills through competent management of 26 sales centers' accounts in the Florida Division. Implemented a process improvement system to assist in reconciliations. Prepared customer billing and developed reports weekly for upper management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Demonstrated leadership skills through management of teams and development of strong working relationships with lenders and customers.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Successfully managed multiple projects, including the management of 26 sales centers' accounts and implementation of a process improvement system.

skills.name: Process Improvement
skills.explanation: Implemented a process improvement system to assist in reconciliations, demonstrating strong proficiency in process improvement.

skills.name: Sales
skills.explanation: Exhibited excellent sales skills, including rapport building, presentation, and closing skills, and consistently exceeded quotas.

skills.name: Credit Management
skills.explanation: Efficiently analyzed personal lines of credit to determine acceptability and provided full loan service functions for customers.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Possesses a Bachelor's degree in Accounting and has experience in financial management, indicating a solid working proficiency in accounting.

skills.name: Billing
skills.explanation: Prepared customer billing, but the extent of experience is not clear, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Rapport Building
skills.explanation: Developed strong rapport with customers and lenders, demonstrating a solid working proficiency in rapport building.

skills.name: Relationship Building
skills.explanation: Built strong working relationships with lenders and customers, indicating a solid working proficiency in relationship building.

skills.name: Automotive
skills.explanation: Mentioned as an industry, but no specific skills or experience are described, indicating no clear proficiency.

skills.name: Closing
skills.explanation: Mentioned as a skill, but no specific experience or proficiency is described, indicating no clear proficiency.
